subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Cardinals pulled to one game behind the Atlanta Braves in the National League wild-card race as Rafael Furcal hit a tiebreaking home run in the eighth inning Sunday.
snippet: The St. Louis Cardinals pulled to one game behind the Atlanta Braves in the National League wild-card race as Rafael Furcal hit a tiebreaking home run in the eighth inning Sunday.
